alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 245 PM MST... At 214 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cotton Center, or 14 miles northeast of Gila Bend, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. This includes AZ Route 85 between mile markers 131 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
